dtliExcerpt: I first caught it in Chicago, when the production remained a bit of a mess, and can report that the Broadway version reflects a lot of good new work.

keyPhrases.quote: remained a bit of a mess
reflects a lot of good new work
the Broadway version reflects a lot of good new work

llmScore.reasoning: Claude: The critic acknowledges significant improvement from a problematic earlier version to a Broadway production with 'a lot of good new work,' suggesting qualified positive recommendation. | GPT-4o-mini: The review indicates improvements in the Broadway version but still acknowledges past issues, leading to a mixed-positive recommendation.

showScoreExcerpt: "The Wiz is all about feeling...in complex times, its simple message rings loud and clear"
